description: Chiseled cutie Lucas Leon has been crushing on his sexy roommate muscular, tattooed Domonic Micheals for as long as he can remember. He started having vivid dreams of them getting hot and heavy so when Domonic finally approaches him, he thinks he’s still dreaming! Lucas is so happy that he drops to his knees, and slides his lips onto Domonic’s big, black cock.
title: Dreams Do Come True
